Based on your preferences, I recommend "End of Watch". This movie stars David Harbour and Frank Grillo, who are both well-known for their roles in other movies.
In "End of Watch", the movie follows two police officers, Dave (David Harbour) and Steve (Frank Grillo), as they deal with the daily grind of policing. However, when they come across a group of drug dealers, things quickly escalate into a violent encounter between the police officers and the drug dealers.
Despite the violence that takes place in "End of Watch", the movie ultimately ends on a note of hope and redemption. In the final scene of the movie, Dave (David Harbour) and Steve (Frank Grillo) have successfully captured the drug dealers who were responsible for the violent encounter between the police officers and the drug dealers.
